sentences: Eric T. Vogel (1896 â€“ 1980) was a Czech jazz trumpeter.
In 1938, Vogel played trumpet in a dixieland combo.
After being arrested at Brno in 1939 he was made to organize a jazz school in the Jewish ghetto of that city.
In Theresienstadt concentration camp he played with Martin Roman's Ghetto Swingers and Fritz Weiss's Jazz-Quintet-Weiss.
He escaped while being transferred to Dachau concentration camp.
